If you are a streamer, you know how crucial it is to have good streaming software to provide the best experience to your viewers. Streamlabs is a free streaming software that provides everything you need to produce your own streams, with exciting features that every streamer wishes for.

## Setting up Streamlabs

Setting up Streamlabs is effortless. You can either use it directly from the website or download the desktop app from the website. Once you have installed the software, you will need to perform some basic configurations to get started.

Streamlabs can be integrated with various platforms like Youtube, Facebook, and Twitch. You can link your streaming accounts and manage them from one platform, eliminating the need for switching between multiple platforms.

## Features of Streamlabs

### Customization

Streamlabs provides an extensive library of themes, widgets, and alerts to customize your streams with ease. You can customize your stream's look and feel by choosing the appropriate themes and widgets. Also, Streamlabs enables you to insert your own branding into your streams with your custom logo and unique color scheme.

### Alerts and Donations

Streamlabs allows you to send personalized alerts to your viewers for follows, subs, donations, and hosts. Also, it supports several popular donation platforms like PayPal, Stripe, and credit cards, making it more convenient for your viewers to donate.

### Multistreaming

Multistreaming is the ability to stream on multiple platforms simultaneously. Streamlabs allows you to stream on as many platforms as you want, giving you maximum exposure.

### Chatbot

Streamlabs comes with a chatbot that enables you to control your chat like a pro. The bot will keep spammers and trolls at bay while you focus on your stream. It also manages your chat by answering frequently asked questions, displaying your social media information, and even playing minigames with your viewers.

### Integration

Streamlabs integrate with several essential tools for gaming and streaming, such as OBS, Elgato, and XSplit. With the integration of the Streamlabs OBS software with other gaming software, you can easily control everything through one platform.

## Conclusion

Streamlabs is an indispensable streaming software for streamers that takes care of all their streaming needs. Moreover, Streamlabs also provides ample features for not only enhancing the streaming experience but also for creating a new source of income without much hassle. Its customization options are vast, and the toolâ€™s various aspects are intuitive and user-friendly. That said, it's worth considering Streamlabs for streamers looking to add a professional touch to their streams.
